issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Launch Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201106081719
2. Create a project
3. Add a breakpoint to the .js file
4. Run in Debug
5. View in Debugger view

Actual Result:
Debugger fails to launch, but progress window does not give any information

Expected Result:
Debugger should either connect or give a time out error

Workaround:
After restarting the OS, cannot repro.
fields.summary: OSX Lion: Android Only: Intermittent: Debugger does not connect, but does not return any error

comments.body: Closing due to time passed and lack of progress and input.
